title: Understanding the Type of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, different types of analyses are used to achieve specific goals. Consider what the primary goal is when developing a new method to detect substances.

title: Types of Analysis
text: There are several types of analyses in analytical chemistry: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Each serves a different purpose.

title: Focus on Method Development
text: When developing a new method, the focus is often on understanding the underlying principles and mechanisms. This is different from simply measuring or identifying substances.

title: Identifying the Analysis Type
text: Which type of analysis is primarily concerned with developing new methods and understanding the principles behind them?
